name: Space Redi
description: Space Redi is building technology that helps businesses understand, predict, and manage risks associated with human spaceflight and other complex operations. Our software will help with operational planning and real-time risk detection.
one_liner: Space Redi is building technology that helps businesses understand, predict, and manage risks associated with human spaceflight and other complex operations. Our software will help with operational planning and real-time risk detection.
